definition.text: In order to manage contributions from within the app, or update the app by running a command; you first need to provide your Github.com credentials so that we can get you authenticated when pushing your changes to the remote repository.

paragraphs.text: Github Crendentials are Missing. Please solve this issue and try again.

To solve this issue follow the following instructions on how to set up your GitHub.com credentials so that the system can automate the tasks needed to submit your contributions to the main repository of the Superalgos project.
